participant_a.entity_text: BimA homologs in B. mallei and B. thailandensis

verbose_text: Interestingly, BimA homologs in B. mallei and B. thailandensis (which also possess the ability to induce actin based motility in J774.2 cells) can restore the actin based motility defect of a B. pseudomallei bimA mutant.
evidence: BimA homologs in B. mallei and B. thailandensis (which also possess the ability to induce actin-based motility in J774.2 cells) can restore the actin
